queryToExecute.example:
select
  -- Required Columns
  'active_directory' as resource,
  'info' as status,
  'Manual verification required.' as reason;

evaluations.description: Stack evaluations history, including insight evaluations and compliance evaluations

status.description: Stack status. CREATED, EVALUATED, IN_PROGRESS, FAILED

jobId.description: Evaluation Job ID to find the job results

count.description: Number of Resources of this Resource Type - Metric

old_count.description: Number of Resources of this Resource Type in the past - Metric

result.description: Result of query. in order to access a specific cell please use Result[Row][Column]
